language.name: Create user
language.title: Create new user with unique name
language.descr:
Create new user with unique name.
Password must be provided.
Optionally a password expiration time can specified.
language.title: Unique user name
language.descr:
Unique name will be used futher as an id to login user to the system.
Any characters are acceptable.
language.title: Password to login user
language.descr:
Password to login user to the system.
Non zero length.
Any characters are acceptable.
language.title: password expires
language.name: Delete user
language.title: Delete existing user
language.descr: Delete a user from the database
